hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select T.EBLR_ID, T.EBLR_EBLN_CODE, T.REC_VER, T.REC_STATUS, T.CREATOR, T.CREATE_TIME, T.MODIFIER, T.MODIFY_TIME, T.EBLR_CARRIERS_CODE, T.EBLR_CARRIERS_NAME, T.EBLR_DRIVER_CODE, T.EBLR_DRIVER_NAME, T.EBLR_LICENSE_PLATE_NUMBER, T.EBLR_STANDARD_VOLUME, T.EBLR_STANDARD_LOAD, T.EBLR_UNIT, T.EBLR_LOAD_MAX, T.EBLR_LOAD_MIN, T.EBLR_COMMONLY_USED_MODELS, T.EBLR_CUSTOM_NO, T.EBLR_CUSTOM_NAME_CN, T.EBLR_VOLUME_MAX, T.EBLR_VOLUME_MIN from EB_LINE_CARRIERS T WHERE T.EBLR_EBLN_CODE IN (:eblrEblnCode) <<and T.REC_STATUS=:recStatus>> <<and T.EBLR_CARRIERS_CODE=:eblrCarrtiersCode>> <<and T.EBLR_CUSTOM_NO=:eblrCustomNo>>
